title: Morning Joe 5/19/21
description: The New York attorney general's office said Tuesday that it is pursuing a criminal investigation into the Trump Organization, in addition to the ongoing civil probe.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: The New York attorney general's office said Tuesday that it is pursuing a criminal investigation into the Trump Organization, in addition to the ongoing civil probe.
